## Ozone - Wind simple linear regression 


```{r}
air <- as.matrix(airquality)
y <- air[,1]
X <- air[,3]
reg <- lm(y~X)
reg
```

## Plot

```{r,echo=F}
plot(X,y)
s <- reg$coefficients[1]
t <- reg$coefficients[2]
abline(a=s,b=t)
```
